sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"军队，部队"之意。
means: army ：表军队的总称，与navy(海军)、air force(空军)并列时指陆军。
troops ：常用复数，多指陆军，着重构成军队的士兵成员，有时也指骑兵部队。
forces ：语体较正式，多用复数形式，既可指包括陆、海、空在内的一个国家的整个武装力量，也可指某一兵种。

sentence.Network_en: The areas are sealed off and ringed by troops.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些地区被军队封锁包围了。

sentence.Network_en: Troops were sent to the islands to restore order last November.
sentence.Network_cn: 去年11月，军队被派往这些岛屿以恢复秩序。

sentence.Network_en: The president said he had no intention of deploying ground troops.
sentence.Network_cn: 总统称并不打算部署地面部队。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 摘：美国军事术语大全 ... troop basis 部队编成表 troops 部队 turning movement 迂回.
He correctly predicted that invading Iraq with too few troops would lead to chaos ., 他正确预言用太少兵力入侵伊拉克将会导致混乱.

in the Civil War he organized and led " Hampton's Legion " of South Carolina troops , fighting at Bull Run and Gettysburg and serving as second in command under Jeb Stuart .南北战争时期组织和指挥南卡罗来纳军队的「汉普顿军团」，经历布尔渊和盖茨堡战役，担任指挥官斯图尔特的副手。

McCain unsettled Obama when he claimed that US military leaders suggested Obama's plan to pull all US troops out of Iraq by the middle of 2010 was dangerous .麦凯恩则攻击奥巴马说，美国军方领导人认为奥巴马提出的在2010年中期之前撤出所有驻伊部队的计划十分危险，这让奥巴马坐立不安。

list.abs: global-positioning technology 全球定位技术ground troops 地面部队hand-to-hand combat 肉搏战
字典中劲字的解释 ... (11) 坚强;刚强[ tenacious] 精锐部队[ crack troops] (1) 加强[ strengthen].
Sinograma « 大 » - Diccionario de Sinogramas ... 大便[ defecate;shit] 大兵[ large troops] 大部[ a greater part].
百度词典搜索_军 ... join the army; 参军 enemy troops;the enemy 敌军 labour army;contingent of labour forces; 劳动军.

entry.def: Troops are soldiers, especially when they are in a large organized group doing a particular task.

example.ex: The next phase of the operation will involve the deployment of more than 35,000 troops from a dozen countries...
example.tran: 下一阶段的军事行动将要对来自 12 个国家的 35,000多名士兵进行部署。

example.ex: There were reports of troop movements.
example.tran: 有报道称将要调动军队。

entry.def: A troop is a group of soldiers within a cavalry or armoured regiment.

example.ex: ...a troop of enemy cavalry trotting towards the Dutch right flank.
example.tran: 敌方一支骑兵队正冲向荷兰军右翼

entry.def: A troop of boy scouts is a local group of them that meets regularly.
A troop of people or animals is a group of them.

example.ex: Amy was aware of the little troop of travellers watching the two of them...
example.tran: 埃米知道那一小队旅行者正在看着她们俩。

example.ex: Out of beams and cracks came troops of beetles, ants and spiders.
example.tran: 从横梁上和裂缝里爬出来了一群群甲虫、蚂蚁和蜘蛛。

entry.tran: (常指疲惫或忧伤地)成群移动，结队前行
entry.def: If people troop somewhere, they walk there in a group, often in a sad or tired way.

example.ex: They all trooped back to the house for a rest...
example.tran: 他们都成群结队地回到房子里休息。

example.ex: The men trooped into work with resignation.
example.tran: 男人们被迫只好一伙伙地开始工作。
